name: Bearded Man Filling a Glass
description: Bearded Man Filling a Glass; Giorgio Vasari (Italian, 1511 - 1574); about 1544 - 1545; Pen and brown ink and brown wash over black chalk, heightened with white gouache, on blue paper; 44.9 x 19.7 cm (17 11/16 x 7 3/4 in.); 94.GA.33.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Bearded Man Filling a Glass
medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash over black chalk, heightened with white gouache, on blue paper
